    Kiyoshi Yagi

      • readSegments

        public Segment[] readSegments()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the segments from the specified PDB file
        Returns:
        an array of segments
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when an IO error occurred

      • readCoordinates

        public double[][] readCoordinates()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the coordinates of the atoms. It is assumed to be called after the modeling stage, that is, the number of atoms/residues/segments and their order must be consistent with the system that is already set to the Reader. Only the number of atoms is checked, but the name (or type) and the orders is unchecked.
        Returns:
        xyz coordinates of the atoms (bohr)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when an IO error is detected or when the system is not set.

      • readBox

        public Box readBox()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the periodic box from the specified PDB file
        Returns:
        the periodic box
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception while reading a box

      • readTitle

        public java.lang.String readTitle()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readTrajectory

        public Trajectory readTrajectory()
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the coordinates and optionally the boxes along the trajectory. It is assumed to be called after the modeling stage, that is, the number of atoms/residues/segments and their order must be consistent with the system that is already set to the Reader.
        Returns:
        Instance of Trajectory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown when an IO error is detected or when the system is not set.

      • setAlternateLocation

        public void setAlternateLocation(java.lang.String altLoc)
        Sets the label of an alternate location to be read from the PDB file
        Parameters:
        altLoc - The label of an alternate location
